entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
